>Construction of q1product
PCR q1oligo1,q1oligo2 on p20N5 (1672 bp, pcrpdt)
Digest pcrpdt with XhoI,BamHI (1, pcrdig)
Digest pTargetF with BamHI,XhoI (1, vectdig)
Ligate pcrdig,vectdig (q1product)
